Description:
Position at Al Jazeera Media NetworkKey Responsibilities:Record and post all financial transactions in accordance with Finance policies and procedures.
Reconcile and clear balance sheet accounts as per Finance procedures.
Comply with local laws in the Bureaus, ensure Filing of all required tax returns, declarations, statements and information to authorities as and when these become due, and Identify noncompliance issues for assigned bureaus.
Prepare monthly expenses reimbursements for assigned bureaus and ensure adequate cash is maintained in bureaus.
Submit monthly budget request along with approvals for hubs and subsidiaries and ensure adequate cash is maintained in Hub.
Prepare payroll payments for hubs and bureaus within the region.
Post invoices and process vendor/staff payments accurately and on time after checking compliance as per AJMN P&P and TOFA as well as local laws.
Ensure accounting policies and procedures are followed throughout the region and providing recommendations to improve financial controls.
Guide and assist the Admin & Finance staffs in bureaus to perform their duties in all financial and tax compliance matters including liaising with external auditors, tax agents, corporate secretary and other financial consultants.
Review supporting documents for assigned Bureaus and report noncompliance issues.
Keep proper filing and tracking of financial and administrative subjects in shared folder such as; monthly cash journals, reconciliations, bank statements, petty cash count, registration documents, opening bank accounts letters, financial statements, tax filing documents, tax clearance certificate, tax advises and laws, payroll sheets, approvals and monthly supporting document.
Liaise with the Bureau/Hub staffs in ensuring the team understand all finance policies and procedures and answer all the queries.
Preparation and liaising with auditors for Annual statutory audit on financial statements (if applicable).
Preparation and liaising with tax consultants for Corporate Tax annual submission and Transfer Pricing filing(if applicable).
Update the PPE register (if applicable)
Submit monthly invoice for the services performed by Hubs(if applicable).Key Requirements:Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance or related field is a must.
Minimum of 3 years of professional experience is required in general accounting.
Knowledge of financial contracts, audit techniques, AP processes and related financial processes, financial control cycles & Letters of Guarantee (LGs) and Letters of Credit (LCs)Job Details
